title: Strengthening Mathematical Learning Competencies Using Personalized Music Education Recommendation Algorithms

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of fundamental mathematical concepts and general interest in musical elements
context.additional_context: Project-based learning focusing on the integration of music data and mathematical modeling in smartphone-based learning environments

learning_goals: Learners can apply matrix decomposition and latent factor modeling techniques for pattern analysis of music data
Learners can understand the structure of DBN-DNN models and explain parameter optimization processes required for music recommendation systems
Learners can collect and analyze music preference data in smartphone environments to generate personalized learning recommendation lists
Learners can calculate accuracy-recall metrics and interpret results for performance evaluation of music recommendation algorithms

resources: Mobile-Optimized Web-Based Recommendation System Simulation Tool
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
